post.body: Hahah wuss!
yeah, but that ball gag isn't for @evolkween, but for A and it isn't for his mouth! :-O
Sorry, I forgot to bring the gimp mask for @evolkween. I left it at @snarkattack's place when we "caught up" over the weekend.
Right. Did you get a chance to re-dub? I think I came... off much too nasally
never mind. twitter geek-speak... i think i got it wrong anyway.
@snarkattack Sweet. Hurrah for Thursday's miniTUB. What's the hash tag?
Hahah did you see what I did there? Completely mixed up a deer with baby cow! Carnivore fail.
And that fat blond kid is hilarious! Veal schnitzel is interesting. Believe it or not, first time I had bambi.
DM osmosis? :)
Not as wildly fluctuating as Melbourne's weather but the pattern is similar. Feels like winter out there. Meant to be summer!
Mazel tov! :)
And for some reason, Twitter doesn't seem to help. It's crazy!
Oh, I hate when that happens. Frustrating!
Oh yeah, you'll need all your sober facilities to do that. Have a great Christmas!
Hope you and Andrew have a wonderful Christmas! xx
So the better I can do it again tomorrow. Practice, practice, practice!
Ah you see, it's the great Christmas tradition: the post-lunch nap. :)
and @jpoh Salute!
Bubbly?
You, nice? Wow. Miracles ARE possible this time of the year! Thanks, hon. Merry Christmas.
@hopeinhell A fart-mosphere? :P
Actually, I didn't even pick up on that. But yes, all naturally long locks. Well, except for the big girl in the braces! :P
ça va?
Great, mate. Here, glass of bubbly for you. {clink}
Thanks! No credit crunch in this household. ;)
Right, folks. It's been fun but I gotta gets me some sleep. G'night!
Being serenaded with the husky vocal stylings of Duffy before bed.
Alright, you guys. Who's being the bandwidth hog?
The track; the one we danced to Saturday night. ♫ http://blip.fm/~16f6j
Billy Bob in Bad Santa is sublime. Ho, ho, f*cking ho!
That's weird. My DM count has seriously taken a big plunge...?
Off to brother's house for a veal schnitzel dinner. Laters!
Wishing you all a Happy Christmas and a fabulously gay Yuletide! Thanks for the lovely company. xx
Off to midnight mass. Gotta go in early to get the best seats! :P
Watching Carols by Candlelight with a glass of wine.
Yay - brother and his partner have arrived. Time for drinks!
Well so much for watching Yuletide flicks. Just woke up from a three hour nana nap.
Taking off the Santa hat (I've been wearing it all morning) and going to chill with some yuletide flicks. 1st up: Ernest Saves Christmas!
Yay! The *very* last of the online presents I've been waiting for have arrived. Thanks for the timely (expensive) delivery service, Amazon.
Extra letters, missing words. Boy, I think the champers is starting to get to me......
